title: Neural Trader System
description: AI-powered trading signals, portfolio optimization, and risk management with 9 specialized trading modes

mode.title: Trading Mode
mode.description: Select the trading operation mode. Each mode provides specialized analysis and outputs.
enumTitles: Generate Trading Signals - Buy/Sell/Hold with confidence scores
Optimize Portfolio - Markowitz & Kelly Criterion allocation
Deep Market Analysis - 40+ patterns, Fibonacci, indicators
Train Neural Model - Gradient descent with early stopping
Live Trading - Alpaca API paper/live execution
Backtest Strategy - Monte Carlo simulation with CI
Sports Betting - Kelly Criterion with The Odds API
mode.sectionDescription: Essential configuration for all trading modes. Select your trading mode, symbols, and neural network strategy.

symbols.title: Trading Symbols
symbols.description: Enter trading symbols to analyze. Supports stocks (AAPL, TSLA), crypto (BTC/USD, ETH/USD), forex (EUR/USD), and indices (SPY).

strategy.title: Neural Strategy
strategy.description: Choose the neural network architecture for predictions. Ensemble combines all strategies for highest accuracy.
enumTitles: Neural Momentum - Fast pattern recognition, <10ms latency
LSTM Prediction - Time series forecasting, ~50ms latency

riskProfile.title: Risk Profile
riskProfile.description: Set your risk tolerance level. This affects position sizing, stop-loss placement, and signal filtering.
enumTitles: Conservative - Low risk, 2% max loss per trade, tight stops
Aggressive - Higher risk, 10% max loss, wider stops
riskProfile.sectionDescription: Configure position sizing, stop-loss levels, and risk tolerance. These settings protect your capital.

maxPositionSize.title: Max Position Size (%)
maxPositionSize.description: Maximum allocation per position as percentage of portfolio. Lower values reduce concentration risk.

stopLoss.title: Stop Loss (%)
stopLoss.description: Automatic exit when price drops by this percentage from entry. Protects against large losses.

takeProfit.title: Take Profit (%)
takeProfit.description: Automatic exit when price rises by this percentage from entry. Locks in gains.

trailingStop.title: Trailing Stop (%)
trailingStop.description: Dynamic stop that follows price upward. Set to 0 to disable. Helps capture extended moves.

maxDrawdown.title: Max Portfolio Drawdown (%)
maxDrawdown.description: Stop all trading if portfolio drops by this percentage. Set to 0 to disable. Critical risk control.

timeframe.title: Analysis Timeframe
timeframe.description: Candle/bar timeframe for technical analysis. Shorter = more trades, Longer = fewer but larger moves.
timeframe.sectionDescription: Configure timeframes, data sources, and confidence thresholds for market analysis.

lookbackPeriod.title: Lookback Period (Candles)
lookbackPeriod.description: Number of historical candles to analyze. More data = better pattern recognition but slower.

confidenceThreshold.title: Minimum Confidence (%)
confidenceThreshold.description: Only generate signals above this confidence level. Higher = fewer but stronger signals.

dataSource.title: Market Data Source
dataSource.description: Select price data provider. Auto-detect chooses best source based on symbol type.
enumTitles: Alpha Vantage - Stocks, forex (API key needed)

neuralLayers.title: Neural Network Layers
neuralLayers.description: Number of hidden layers. More layers = more complex patterns but slower training.
neuralLayers.sectionDescription: Advanced settings for the neural network model. Default values are optimized for most use cases.

neuralNeurons.title: Neurons Per Layer
neuralNeurons.description: Comma-separated neuron counts for each layer. Example: 128,64,32 for 3 layers.

activation.title: Activation Function
activation.description: Non-linear activation function between layers. ReLU is fastest, Swish is most modern.

dropout.title: Dropout Rate
dropout.description: Regularization to prevent overfitting. Higher = more regularization. Range: 0.0 to 0.5

learningRate.title: Learning Rate
learningRate.description: Training step size. Too high = unstable, too low = slow. Range: 0.0001 to 0.01

epochs.title: Training Epochs
epochs.description: Number of complete passes through training data. More = better fit but risk overfitting.

batchSize.title: Batch Size
batchSize.description: Samples per training step. Larger = faster but more memory. Powers of 2 recommended.

enableGpu.title: GPU Acceleration
enableGpu.description: Use WASM SIMD for faster computations. Recommended for large datasets.

enableSwarm.title: Enable Multi-Agent Swarm
enableSwarm.description: Use multiple neural agents with consensus voting. Increases accuracy by 10-15%.
enableSwarm.sectionDescription: Configure multi-agent coordination for improved prediction accuracy through ensemble voting.

swarmAgents.title: Number of Swarm Agents
swarmAgents.description: How many independent neural agents to use. More agents = better accuracy but slower. Range: 3-10 recommended.

swarmConsensus.title: Consensus Method
swarmConsensus.description: How agents combine their predictions. Weighted average gives best results.

swarmDiversity.title: Strategy Diversity
swarmDiversity.description: Use different neural strategies across agents for true ensemble effect. Recommended.

patterns.title: Chart Patterns to Detect
patterns.description: Select which chart patterns to recognize. 'All Patterns' enables comprehensive detection.
patterns.sectionDescription: Configure chart pattern recognition and technical indicators for market analysis.

enableRsi.title: RSI (Relative Strength Index)
enableRsi.description: Momentum oscillator (0-100). Overbought >70, Oversold <30. Essential indicator.

enableMacd.title: MACD (Moving Average Convergence Divergence)
enableMacd.description: Trend-following momentum indicator. Shows relationship between two moving averages.

enableBollinger.title: Bollinger Bands
enableBollinger.description: Volatility bands around moving average. Squeeze indicates breakout potential.

enableEma.title: EMA (Exponential Moving Average)
enableEma.description: Trend indicator emphasizing recent prices. EMA crossovers signal trend changes.

enableStochastic.title: Stochastic Oscillator
enableStochastic.description: Momentum indicator comparing closing price to range. Good for ranging markets.

enableAtr.title: ATR (Average True Range)
enableAtr.description: Volatility indicator. Used for position sizing and stop-loss placement.

enableAdx.title: ADX (Average Directional Index)
enableAdx.description: Trend strength indicator (0-100). Strong trend >25, Very strong >50.

enableVwap.title: VWAP (Volume Weighted Average Price)
enableVwap.description: Institutional benchmark price. Useful for intraday trading strategies.

enableIchimoku.title: Ichimoku Cloud
enableIchimoku.description: Comprehensive indicator showing support, resistance, trend direction, and momentum.

outputFormat.title: Output Format
outputFormat.description: How to format the results. Full Analysis provides the most detail.
enumTitles: Portfolio Report - Allocation and risk metrics
Webhook Format - For trading bot integration
outputFormat.sectionDescription: Configure how results are formatted and where to send notifications.

webhookUrl.title: Webhook URL
webhookUrl.description: HTTP endpoint to receive trading signals. Must be HTTPS for security. Leave empty to disable.

webhookSecret.title: Webhook Secret Key
webhookSecret.description: Secret key for HMAC signature verification. Secures webhook authenticity.

emailNotifications.title: Email Notifications
emailNotifications.description: Send email alerts for high-confidence signals. Configure in Apify settings.

notifyOnSignal.title: Notify On Signal Types
notifyOnSignal.description: Which signal types should trigger notifications.

dryRun.title: Dry Run Mode (Paper Trading)
dryRun.description: Simulate trades without real execution. ALWAYS enable for testing. Disabling executes real trades!
dryRun.sectionDescription: Settings for live trading mode with Alpaca API. Requires API keys for real trading.

alpacaApiKey.title: Alpaca API Key
alpacaApiKey.description: Your Alpaca trading API key. Get free at alpaca.markets. Required for live trading.

alpacaSecretKey.title: Alpaca Secret Key
alpacaSecretKey.description: Your Alpaca secret key. Keep confidential. Required for live trading.

alpacaPaper.title: Use Alpaca Paper Trading
alpacaPaper.description: Use Alpaca's paper trading environment. Recommended for testing strategies safely.

autoTrade.title: Auto-Execute Trades
autoTrade.description: WARNING: Automatically execute trades when signals are generated. Use with extreme caution!

maxDailyTrades.title: Maximum Daily Trades
maxDailyTrades.description: Limit trades per day to control costs and risk. Set to 0 for unlimited (not recommended).

tradingHoursOnly.title: Trade During Market Hours Only
tradingHoursOnly.description: Only execute trades during regular market hours (9:30 AM - 4:00 PM ET for US stocks).

initialCapital.title: Initial Capital ($)
initialCapital.description: Starting portfolio value for backtest simulation. Use realistic amounts for meaningful results.
initialCapital.sectionDescription: Settings for Monte Carlo backtesting mode. Simulates historical performance with statistical confidence.

backtestDays.title: Backtest Period (Days)
backtestDays.description: Number of historical days to test. Longer periods provide more statistical significance.

monteCarloRuns.title: Monte Carlo Simulations
monteCarloRuns.description: Number of randomized simulations for confidence intervals. More = more accurate but slower.

walkForward.title: Walk-Forward Optimization
walkForward.description: Use rolling train/test splits to prevent overfitting. Recommended for robust results.

slippage.title: Slippage (%)
slippage.description: Simulated price slippage per trade. Realistic values: 0.05-0.2% for liquid assets.

commission.title: Commission Per Trade ($)
commission.description: Trading commission/fees per trade. Many brokers now offer $0 commissions.

bankroll.title: Starting Bankroll ($)
bankroll.description: Total betting bankroll for sports betting mode. Kelly Criterion sizes bets from this.
bankroll.sectionDescription: Settings for sports betting mode with Kelly Criterion optimal bet sizing.

minEdge.title: Minimum Edge (%)
minEdge.description: Only bet when model probability exceeds market odds by this percentage. Higher = fewer but safer bets.

kellyFraction.title: Kelly Fraction
kellyFraction.description: Fraction of full Kelly criterion to use. 0.25 = quarter Kelly (safer), 0.5 = half Kelly (recommended).

maxBetSize.title: Maximum Bet Size (%)
maxBetSize.description: Cap single bet at this percentage of bankroll regardless of Kelly recommendation.

sportsLeagues.title: Sports Leagues
sportsLeagues.description: Which sports/leagues to analyze for betting opportunities.

betTypes.title: Bet Types to Analyze
betTypes.description: Which types of bets to consider. Moneyline and spreads are most common.

oddsApiKey.title: The Odds API Key
oddsApiKey.description: API key for real-time odds. Get free key at the-odds-api.com (500 requests/month free).

minLiquidity.title: Minimum Market Liquidity ($)
minLiquidity.description: Only analyze markets with at least this much liquidity. Higher = more reliable but fewer opportunities.
minLiquidity.sectionDescription: Settings for Polymarket prediction markets analysis and probability modeling.

marketCategories.title: Market Categories
marketCategories.description: Which prediction market categories to analyze.

minProbabilityEdge.title: Minimum Probability Edge (%)
minProbabilityEdge.description: Only show opportunities where model probability differs from market by at least this much.

marketTimeHorizon.title: Market Time Horizon
marketTimeHorizon.description: Filter markets by when they resolve. Shorter horizons = faster feedback.

exchanges.title: Cryptocurrency Exchanges
exchanges.description: Which exchanges to monitor for price discrepancies. More exchanges = more opportunities.
exchanges.sectionDescription: Settings for cross-exchange cryptocurrency and DeFi arbitrage detection.

minSpread.title: Minimum Price Spread (%)
minSpread.description: Only report arbitrage when price difference exceeds this percentage after fees.

includeDeFi.title: Include DeFi Protocols
includeDeFi.description: Scan decentralized exchanges (Uniswap, SushiSwap, etc.) for arbitrage opportunities.

defiProtocols.title: DeFi Protocols to Monitor
defiProtocols.description: Which decentralized protocols to include in arbitrage scanning.

triangularArbitrage.title: Triangular Arbitrage
triangularArbitrage.description: Detect multi-hop arbitrage paths (e.g., BTC->ETH->USDT->BTC). More complex but profitable.

includeFlashLoans.title: Include Flash Loan Opportunities
includeFlashLoans.description: Detect arbitrage executable via flash loans (advanced). Requires DeFi expertise.

maxLatency.title: Maximum Execution Latency (ms)
maxLatency.description: Exclude opportunities that require faster execution than this. Lower = more opportunities but harder to execute.
